column4: i accidentally deleted usr  folder and i am worried  that my sys won't boot if i shut it down. how will i replace it?
but without /usr it might be hard to fix the system
if you check the links ubottu sent you you'll find that it mentions some tools that are a bit more advanced than the trash can =)
but most likely you're looking at a reinstall.. some of the files recovered might be damaged without you knowing about it resulting in some very weird behaviour in the future
